segments.text: I see the woman standing in front of the sink, seemingly unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on that plate, as if the world outside the window has disappeared.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks so peaceful, contrasting sharply with the brewing trouble inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think itâ€™s strange how she hasn't noticed the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is forming rapidly, and I can almost hear it sloshing on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she only took a moment to look down, she might realize what is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for the children, especially the boy on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
